title: BungeeCord服务端的CatServer子服无法连接
author: KTR
txt_content:
CatServer单端开的时候进得去。但放在群组子服里面就无法进入,输入/server CatServer后，CatServer端刷出玩家lost connection：Timed out的信息

CatServer端无EULA,online-mode也已关闭

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
bungeecord换成waterfall试一下？据说对mod核心友好
